verses.roman:
tā-sabā tārite prabhu sei saba deśe
yogya-bhakta jīva-dehe karena 'āveśe'

synonyms: tā-sabā—all of them; tārite—to deliver; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sei—those; saba—all; deśe—in countries; yogya-bhakta—a suitable devotee; jīva-dehe—in the body of such a living entity; karena—does; āveśe—entrance.
translation: To deliver people in regions throughout the universe who could not meet Him, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu personally entered the bodies of pure devotees.
